about_the_game:
Unleash the power of gravity in with the Gravity Fields DLC! Dive into a world where the laws of physics are your playground, and manipulate the forces of nature to create, control, and conquer

Gravity Manipulation: Harness the power of gravity fields to move, lift, and hurl objects with unprecedented precision. Create intricate chain reactions and watch as your environment comes to life



Vast Sandbox Environment: Explore expansive landscapes filled with interactive objects. Experiment with gravity fields and manipulate your surroundings



Innovative Gameplay Mechanics: Utilize gravity to control the world around you. The possibilities are endless when you have the force of gravity at your fingertips



Stunning Visuals: Experience the breathtaking effects of gravity manipulation with high-quality graphics and realistic physics simulations. Every object reacts dynamically to the gravitational forces you apply



Creative Freedom: Spawn unlimited physics enabled items from a vast array of objects and start transforming your world with the power of gravity



Whether you're a seasoned player of Unreal Physics or a newcomer looking for innovative gameplay, the Gravity Fields DLC offers endless hours of creative fun. Bend the laws of physics and let your imagination soar!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 | AMD Radeon HD 6670
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 57
  • Processor: Intel Core i17-19900KS | AMD Ryzen 27 9950X8D
  • Memory: 9898989989898989989898989989898989989898989899898989899898998989889898989 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForceDeezNuts PTX 23090 | Radeon GX 6914352L
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Unleash the power of gravity in the Gravity Fields DLC! Manipulate gravity fields to move, lift, and control vast numbers of objects in an expansive sandbox environment. Explore innovative gameplay mechanics and experience stunning visuals. Bend the laws of physics and let your imagination soar!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
